rules_text:
Choose five. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.
• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
• Each opponent loses 2 life.
• Each opponent discards a card.
flavor_text:
[i]“Sometimes, I look at mortals and wonder if we aren't so bad in comparison.”

notes: !update reworked: Was {X}{B}{B}. Choose X. If X is 5 or greater, you may choose the same mode more than once. 'Draw a card and lose 1 life' changed to 'Each opponent sacrifices an enchantment', added planeswalker to creature mode.
